attributes.action: let students in full time edication use buses, trains, etc for free or for a much lower fare.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most students do not have enough money for the increasing travel prices on public transport. Students generally do not have enough time to spare inbetween studying, and to get a job in which they can keep up and have to spend hundreds of pounds a year on public transport to and from their place of education. I am a student myself and I find that it is hard to be able to afford to travel anywhere on public transport as it is too expensive. I am not saying that we should all get free unlimited travel, but I am saying that we should be able to get, at least, a much reduced fare. Pensioners can travel for free, and ever since they have had that privelage, public transport prices have risen dramatically. I am also not saying that pensioners should have to pay but I am saying that students in education should at least get a greater reduced or free travel fare on public transport.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/student-rail/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
